Description: Dubai Islamic Bank (known as: DIB) is a public company, listed on Dubai Financial Market (DFM) since March 2000. DIB operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has 72 subsidiaries operating across Southern and Central Asia, the Carribian, British Islands, Australia and New Zealand, Western Europe, Northern Africa, Southeast Asia, Middle East and Southern Europe. DIB is based in Dubai, UAE and was established in March 1975.
